title: Spacious 2 Bedroom/ 2 Bathroom Available Now!
posting_body: The apartment features a large sunny living space, dishwasher, 10 ft tin ceilings, and exposed brick.
Private storage unit and laundry in the building.
Amazing location Frame apartment situated in the heart of El Cajon.
1 Bedroom Basement suite $900 for rent September 1st.
Suitable for a maximum of TWO people.
The suite includes, water, washer & dryer, dishwasher, two parking spots, and a shared beautiful backyard.
Only 5 mins walk to Fernwood village and shops.
Close to downtown and on a bus route.
We will be hosting viewings of the suite the weekend of Saturday August 6th & Sunday 7th from 10am to 5pm.
If you are interested in viewing the suite please contact us to book a time .If
